function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact with actuator technology.","Impact":"Potential spread of disease among users who come into physical contact with the technology.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of actuator technology surfaces, use of protective barriers or coverings, and implementation of hand hygiene protocols for users.","Technologies":"Use of antimicrobial materials for actuator surfaces, development of touchless interfaces to reduce physical contact.","People":"Users, maintenance staff, and anyone who comes into contact with the technology.","Owner":"Manufacturers, facility managers, and developers of actuator technology."},{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through mid-air tactile enabling technologies.","Impact":"Potential spread of disease via airborne transmission through the use of mid-air tactile technologies.","Mitigation":"Implementation of air purification systems, regular disinfection of surfaces, and education about airborne transmission risks.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, antimicrobial coatings for surfaces, and touchless interfaces to reduce physical contact.","People":"Users, maintenance staff, and anyone who comes into contact with the technology.","Owner":"Developers and manufacturers of mid-air tactile technologies."}]}
